DOC.brief_title: Effect Intravenous Hyoscine Butylbromide Injection Labour High Risk Women
DOC.detailed_description: A case control trial Patients meet inclusion criterion ask participate study write consent obtain patient explain thoroughly nature scope study . For patient : 1 . Complete history take exclude allergy hyoscine butylbromide , medical disorder pregnancy ( preeclampsia , diabetes mellitus , heart disease â€¦etc . ) contraindication vaginal delivery . 2 . General examination patient include ( pulse , blood pressure , temperature ) . 3 . Obstetric Abdominal examination include fetal lie , fetal presentation , head station uterine contraction . 4 . Vaginal examination include cervical dilatation , effacement position , state fetal membrane , present part , position fetal head pelvic adequacy . 5 . Obstetric ultrasound detect fetal gestational age , fetal birth weight amount liquor , site placental attachment fetal heart rate . Patients divide three equal group : Group A : included 40 pregnant patient . They receive two ml normal saline intravenously placebo . Group B : include 40 pregnant patient . They receive ( 20mg ) hyoscine butylbromide ( one ml HBB+ one ml saline ) intravenously . Group C : include 40 pregnant patient .They receive two ml ( 40 mg ) hyoscine butylbromide intravenously ( HBB ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : 18 35 year old 2 . Primigravdae multigravida 3 . Gestational age complete 37 41 week + 6 day . 4 . Uncomplicated cephalic singleton pregnancy occiptoanterior position . 5 . Established spontaneous active labour ( define presence least three regular uterine contraction 10 minute cervical dilatation three four centimeter ) cervical effacement le 50 % . 6 . Intact amniotic membrane . 7 . High risk pregnancy ( woman pregnancy induce hypertension cardiacDiabetes Mellitus 1 . Multigravidae . 2 . Multiple fetus . 3 . Malpresentation . 4 . Patients indication elective caesarean section . 5 . Medical condition associate pregnancy e.g . preeclampsia , diabetes mellitus . 6 . Contraindications hyoscine butylbromide include know allergy hyoscine atropinics ( e.g. , atropine , scopolamine ) , myasthenia gravis , megacolon glaucoma . 7 . Patients presented causality spontaneous rupture membrane . 8 . Spontaneous rupture membrane active phase first stage labour . 9 . Oxytocin induction augmentation . 10 .
